name: Jane
bio: Jane Smith is a software engineer at Facebook and a co-organizer of React Summit. She specializes in building scalable front-end architectures and inclusive UI design. Jane often speaks about accessibility in React and mentoring women in tech.

name: John
bio: John Doe is a senior front-end engineer at Google with over 10 years of experience. He leads the FastForms project and contributes to ViteJS, focusing on performance and advanced React patterns.

name: Bob
bio: Bob Johnson is a lead developer at Microsoft and a React core contributor. He’s active in open-source governance and React DevTools plugin development.

name: Alice
bio: Alice Williams is a UI engineer at Apple, focusing on design systems and front-end accessibility. She speaks internationally and was featured in Women Who Code’s top 100.

name: Emily
bio: Emily Davis is a software engineer at Google and a contributor to the React Compiler. She’s passionate about Server Components, compiler optimization, and AI integration.

name: Mike
bio: Mike Brown is a front-end architect at Amazon and co-organizer of React Summit. He’s known for practical workshops on monorepos, CI/CD, and TypeScript.

name: David
bio: David Wilson is a senior React engineer at Meta. He trains new hires, contributes to React Native, and speaks on testing strategies and state management.

name: Mat
bio: Mat Harris is a principal engineer at Microsoft, working on VS Code integrations and improving developer experience in React and React Native.
